name: ZXC
description:
In a small notebook, an abandoned character was drawn without any story.
For a long time, the character lived lonely and trapped in the notebook, but one day, the character gathered courage and decided to escape the notebook.

Avoid the various backgrounds drawn on the note and obstacles that hinder the character and advance towards the end of this note.

Gameplay
There are various backgrounds drawn on the note that look like they were drawn by a person. Climb up and avoid the background with simple but challenging controls.

-Be prepared for the dangers of various traps!
There are many traps hidden throughout the beautiful-looking background that can hinder the characters. If you don't avoid the trap, there's no guarantee what the consequences will be...

-Choose where you land carefully!
All objects interact with the character. Find a place for your character to rest in the bouncy background!

●High risk, high return
●All progress is automatically saved
●Repetitive play
●Various gimmicks that harass players
●Unique graphic background
●Simple operation


Manipulation


Various gimmicks


Interference Trap


Game background
Travel freely in a sketch-like background drawn on paper.

●Classic graphics
●Sketch-style background
●Smooth operation
